name: Your Friendly Neighborhood Arsonist
description:
A City (un)Building Game

Play as an arsonist trying to save your community the only way you know how — by blowing stuff up. The LESS buildings there are, the MORE powerful you become.

This game was created for Blackthornprod Game Jam #3. The theme was "Less is More".

Credits

All content was made by me during the span of this jam (except the song, which I created before the jam). No pre-existing art or code were used.

I used the "Sweetie 16" palette by GrafxKid in my artwork. You can check out the palette here: https://lospec.com/palette-list/sweetie-16

I used BFXR to create the sound effects: https://www.bfxr.net/
